name: Research Collective
description: A open-source dApp (decentralized app) built with React, Ethereum, Aragon, and 3Box over other technologies that allows researchers to share their work and achieve 'web of trust'

name: Incible
description: A client-side app built with React & Redux that allows user to manage their client complains. In addition to authentication, it allows users to create, read, update, and delete 'incidents'

name: Incible API
description: An API that powers all the operations for above mentioned Incible project. The API is built on Node.js with Express, MongoDB, Bcrypt, and JWT using best practices.

name: Sleek
description: A Slack clone built for iOS using Swift 4, Alamofire, SwiftyJSON, and SocketIO over other libraries. Users can create profiles, set avatars, create channels, send, and recieve messages

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: As the name says, as Tic-Tac-Toe game built for iOS using Swift. In addition to play the game, you can also store history and watch a 'replay' of your previous games.

name: Planogram
description: A real-time project management tool built using React, Redux, and Firebase. Allows users to create, read, and edit project docs. Users can also see real-time notification of those actions.
